verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:48
verses.text: Therefore shalt thou serve thine enemies which the Lord shall send against thee, in hunger, and in thirst, and in nakedness, and in want of all things: and he shall put a yoke of iron upon thy neck, until he have destroyed thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:49
verses.text: The Lord shall bring a nation against thee from far, from the end of the earth, as swift as the eagle flieth; a nation whose tongue thou shalt not understand;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:50
verses.text: A nation of fierce countenance, which shall not regard the person of the old, nor shew favour to the young:
